faqs.question: What is the typical time frame for plot possession and construction commencement in Sector 61

faqs.question: How does RERA regulation affect plot sales in Sector 61 Gurugram
faqs.answer: RERA the Real Estate Regulatory Authority plays a vital role in protecting buyer interests. Any plot that is part of a larger project or township developed by a builder must be RERA registered. RERA ensures timely project delivery transparent transactions and adherence to committed specifications thereby significantly reducing the risks associated with buying developing plots in Gurugram.

Typically the construction is limited to residential use and the number of floors allowed is predetermined usually Ground plus 3 or 4 floors plus a basement depending on the plot size and sector norms.
